Player History
Drafted in 32nd round, 383rd overall pick, by Toronto in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Titus Cortright (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2019, off Timothy Hannum (LA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2019, hitting .444 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Conference Championship with Toronto in 2019...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $2,460,000 per year...
